title: Generous compensation
description: We offer competitive salary packages, generous annual leave and flexible work arrangements to support your work-life balance.

title: Wellness programs
description: Feel supported with free workplace mental health resources, on-site virtual wellness activities, Employee Assistance Program (EAP), and more.

title: Pension and group savings
description: Prepare for your future with defined benefit or defined contribution pension plans, group RRSP, group TFSA and financial advisor services.

title: Learning and development
description: Take advantage of resources to help expand your skills, knowledge and abilities to enable long-term personal and professional growth.

title: Health and dental
description: We've got you covered with extended health and dental, disability and life insurance benefits.

title: Employee discounts
description: Save money on things you enjoy with our wide range of national and regional discounts.
